name: 嚴建隆
objective:
本課程介紹基本的金屬切削原理及其實務應用。本課程包含以下各項主題：(1) 工具機與加工操作，(2) 基本切削力學，(3) 金屬切削溫度，(4) 刀具壽命與刀具材料，(5) 切削液與切削表面粗度，(6) 金屬切削操作經濟學，(7) 切屑控制，(8) 研磨加工，(9) 金屬切削實驗方法，(10) CAD/CAM 與數控加工，(11) 精密切削技術等。
This course is an introduction to basic metal-cutting principles and their practical applications. This course includes the following topics: (1) machine tools and machining operations, (2) fundamental metal-cutting mechanics, (3) temperature effect in metal machining, (4) tool lifetime and tool materials, (5) cutting coolants and surface roughness, (6) economics of meta-cutting operations, (7) chip control, (8) grinding, (9) experimental methods on metal machining, (10) CAD/CAM and numerical control (NC) machining, (11) techniques for precision machining.
